Tool:          zlib
Last Updated:  January 10 2018
Version:       1.2.11
Last Build:    January 10 2018

Notes:

Download: https://zlib.net/

1- Rename Projects Target name to proper (i.e. "_x64_d, _x64")
2- Use CMAKE to create targets for VS
3- Rename install dirs to an internal one
3- Copy static libs
